title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Boil the spaghetti until al dente.
Mix eggs and cheese in a bowl.
Combine spaghetti, bacon, and egg mixture.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices.
Grill or pan fry the chicken.
Serve hot with rice or naan.

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
summary: A quick and healthy mix of sautéed vegetables with soy and sesame flavor.
instructions: Heat vegetable oil in a pan over medium-high heat.
Add garlic and sauté until fragrant.
Add broccoli, carrots, and peppers. Stir-fry for 3–4 minutes.
Add zucchini and cook for another 2 minutes.
Pour in soy sauce and sesame oil and mix well.
Cook until vegetables are tender but still crisp.
Garnish with sesame seeds and serve hot.
